price: 65. Wayse is khilaafeen xisbiyadii (ehlu Kitaabkii) dhexdooda (xagga arrinka Ciise). Ee hoog waxaa leh kuwii dulmi falay xagga cadaab Maalin xanuun badan.
arabic: فَٱخۡتَلَفَ ٱلۡأَحۡزَابُ مِنۢ بَيۡنِهِمۡۖ فَوَيۡلٞ لِّلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمٍ أَلِيمٍ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-ikh'talafa al-aḥzābu min baynihim fawaylun lilladhīna ẓalamū min ʿadhābi yawmin alīmin
